old: 狙弓の証　ハンター戦術試練
new: Hunter Tactics Trial: An Ambushing Bow

old:
ハンターの基本戦術を学ぶため
修練の祠にて試練に挑む
new:
In order to learn the basic tactics of Hunter,
challenge the trial of the Training Chapel

old: 修練の祠前の崖下にいる白衛騎士団員と話す
new: Speak with the White Knight at the base of the cliff before the Training Chapel

old: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
new: Speak with Wilson in the Training Chapel

old: 弓射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
射撃の最適距離から弓射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
new: Attack an enemy with Loose from the optimum distance

old: 爆矢射ちで敵を攻撃せよ
new: Attack an enemy with Explosive Arrow

old: 爆矢射ちで仕込んだ矢を起爆させよ
new: Attack the enemy by detonating the explosive arrow

old: 前蹴りで敵を攻撃せよ
new: Attack an enemy with Front Kick

old: 矢の装填を成功させよ
最深部のゴブリンを全滅せよ
new: Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum

old: 最奥にある＜狙弓の証＞を入手する
new: Collect the proof of completing the trial

old: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
new: Report back to Renton in the White Dragon Temple
